title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When the view is resized smaller, the close button moves down from its original position on the same line as the label.
EB: The close button should stay on the same line as the label nomatter how small the view is resized. Ideally, the close button should be located on the far right corner.
SR:
1. Open the view
2. Resize the view to make it smaller
3. Observe the position of the close button
